name: IsPizzaHalfOff
0:
”Alexa is pizza half off?”
”Alexa, ask is pizza half off to set my city to Philadelphia”
”Alexa, ask is pizza half off about the nationals”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: is pizza half off
des:
Can tell you if pizza is half off in D.C. or Philadelphia based on the scores of the four major sports teams! Just ask, "Alexa, is pizza half off?" And Alexa will respond with any valid discount codes for your city.

You can ask about the teams individually, or for a city overall.

This skill defaults to D.C., you can change the default city by saying "Alexa, ask is pizza half off to set my city to Philadelphia" or by using the help intent.

Additional cities may be added in the future.
